Sequence Information.Peptide Name: [Lys4, Ala13,16] brevinine-1pl (brevinine-1pl I4K,I13A,I16A analog, Synthetic AMPs, XXU; 1S=S, UCSS1a)
Sequence Information.Source: amino acid substitution, amphibians, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is unique and shows only very low similarity (87.5%) tobrevinine-1plK: 25%; V=F: 13%; A: 21%.Activity: S. aureus NCTC 6538 or MRSA 12,493 (MIC 8-16 uM), E.faecium NCTC 12,697 (MIC >128 uM), E. coli ATCC 8739 (MIC 16 uM), K. pneumoniae ATCC 43,816 (MIC 16 uM), P. aeruginosa ATCC CRM 9027 (MIC 32 uM), A. baumannii BAA 747 (MIC 32 uM), and C. albicans ATCC 10,231 (MIC 32 uM). MBC same or slightly higher.Structure: random coil in buffer NH4Ac and helical in 50% TFE.In vitro toxicity: horse RBC: HC50 >128 uM, less hemo.lytic.
Literature Information.Author: Wang J, Hu J, Pu W, Chen X, Ma C, Jiang Y, Wang T, Chen T, Shaw C, Zhou M, Wang L. 2024
Literature Information.Reference: Comput Struct Biotechnol J. 2024 Sep 19;23:3391-3406. doi: 10.1016/j.csbj.2024.09.006.PubMed
Literature Information.Title: Discovery, Development and Optimisation of a Novel Frog Antimicrobial Peptide with Combined Mode of Action Against Drug-resistant Bacteria
